Html:
Hi there

Both Glee and graphviz converters need graphs that extend the IVertexAndEdgeListGraph.
This means as far as I have understood that only directed graphs can be visualised.
Am I correct? Is there a way to visualize non-directed graphs

Thank you
Both libraries can visualize undirected graphs so QuickGraph should support it. Please open an issue on this.
I've checked in a fix. Works for undirected graphs as well.
